-1.title: Sheer Delight
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Picture Perfect
1.plot: Lacey Summers is a lingerie designer in NYC struggling to make ends met. Lacey's brother Cody the building handy man is proving to be quite handy with the models. Vanessa is an actress that moves in with Lacey to help offset the costs.

2.title: Designer Love
2.plot: Cody and Joanne's love making sets the apartment on fire. Lacey gives Jason something to remember before he leaves for his out of town shoot. Vanessa and Josie have a steamy session of phone sex. Marilyn is getting ideas about Ian.

3.title: Double or Nothing
3.plot: The relationship between Lacey and Rick is making Jason over sensitive and soft. Jeffery sets him straight. Russ is a little bashful with women. He makes a bet with Cody about a pretty blonde in the bar.

4.title: Russ Gets His Girl
4.plot: Russ wants a meaningful relation instead of just hot sex with different beautiful women. Cody brings a women back to Lacey's place by saying that he designs lingerie. Vanessa derails Cody's attempt to impress her in an impressive way.

5.title: Temptation
5.plot: Lacey and team consider expanding the business to include mens underwear. The heat is really turned up between the Fireman and the Designer. Stephanie throws herself at Cody. Jason takes some very sexy photos of Vanessa.

6.title: By Design
6.plot: Ian steals Lacey's lingerie design. Stephanie plays mind games with Cody. He wants to make a clean break from her, but now he just confused. Stephanie has a date with a guy she met online.

7.title: Comfort Fit
7.plot: Cody and Russ use an online dating service that is dedicated to one night hook-ups. Jason and Vanessa's photo session turns into a passionate love making session.

8.title: Everyone's a Critic
8.plot: Marilyn arranges a review of Lacey's new designs by one of New York's top fashion critics not knowing that Lacey and Rick are on a weekend getaway. In Lacey's absence, Marilyn, Stephanie and Jeffery put together a fashion show - sort of.

9.title: Model Behavior
9.plot: Lacey and Jason argue about their relationship. Marilyn tries to convince Cormac to help Lacey. Stephanie finds an interesting way to get models for the company.

10.title: Double Double
10.plot: Vanessa's old girlfriend Josie from Seattle pays her a visit. Lacey gets an interesting idea after visiting Cody. Marilyn and Cormac make a new deal.

11.title: Model Girlfriends
11.plot: Lacey throws a lingerie party to raise money and awareness of her clothing line. Cody and Russ ask several of the women they have dated to be models for the party.

12.title: Runway Ready
12.plot: Lacey and Vanessa finally have that talk about Jason. They decide to remain close friends. Marilyn gives Lacey a check from a secret investor. It's enough to go full ahead with her line and put on a great fashion show.

13.title: Rags to Riches
13.plot: Lacey has her big fashion show and finally learns the identity of her secret investor. Cody expresses his feelings for Stephanie. Vanessa and Francine really shine during the fashion show.

1.title: Careful What You Wish For
1.plot: Lacey's fashion show collection is a hit, and she gets a huge order from Sebastian. Cody's brush with the limelight has made him a pain to deal with, especially for a stressed-out, overworked Stephanie. Vanessa starts her new career as a TV star. And Nicole, a waitress at the local eatery, becomes the focus of a bet between designer Giovanna and talent agent Richard.

2.title: Looks Are Deceiving
2.plot: Giovanna gives Nicole a makeover and introduces her to Hugh, her former protégé, but it is Nicole's friend, Taylor, who helps her get over her shyness and learn to love attention. Giovanna rekindles an old flame. Lacey wants to manufacture her line in the U.S.

3.title: Everybody Loves Cody
3.plot: Giovanna learns about Lacey's contract with Sebastian and vows to get even. She starts a charm offensive with Lacey, inviting her to lunch and offering to become Lacey's mentor. Jason and Lacey take things to the next level. Stephanie is hurt by Cody's growing narcissism and takes a step back.

4.title: Worse for the Wear
4.plot: Giovanna pays Lacey's studio a visit, and suggests that they become partners. Vanessa continues her passionate tryst with Rena "off set." Stephanie finally crumbles under all the business and personal pressure and makes a big decision.

5.title: Three Is Never a Crowd
5.plot: Vanessa overhears Jason and Lacey making love which later sparks an interesting conversation with Lacey. Lacey makes Jason an offer he shouldn't refuse. Nicole and Cody meet a joint photo shoot and sparks do not fly.

6.title: The Morning After
6.plot: The morning after their first night together is a little awkward for Jason, Lacey and Vanessa. Lacey confesses her threesome to Marilyn. Nicole and Richard spend a day together which leads to a fun night. Vanessa and Rena make love in the loft.

7.title: She's Got Legs
7.plot: Lacey and Vanessa have fun with a sleeping Jason; a troubled Marilyn finds solace in the arms of painter and ex-lover Daniel; Joanne joins Lacey and Jeffrey in the lingerie business.

8.title: Nothing's Ever Easy
8.plot: Giovanna seduces Phillip in order to sabotage the launch of Lacey's line by misdirecting the delivery of Lacey's line for the next day's debut. She also pairs Cody and Nicole for a shoot, which means they must find a way to get along. Jason accepts an assignment from his ex-wife, Tracy, which makes Lacey jealous. Cody and Nicole have dinner together and end up in bed.

9.title: Screwed
9.plot: Tracy tells Jason she got the go-ahead for his book, which precipitates a jealous argument between Jason and Lacey. Phillip confronts Giovanna about the misplaced shipment. Sebastian cancels Lacey's contract. Nicole and Cody regain their angry spark thanks to sexual jealousy. Lacey makes amends for her own outburst by greeting Jason in a candle-lit bedroom when he gets home

10.title: Naughty Couture
10.plot: Vanessa's popularity eclipses Hugh's, and it looks as though he will be written out of the show. Nicole finds out that Giovanna is using her to spy on Lacey. Sebastian learns about Giovanna's sabotage. Lacey, Jason and Vanessa celebrate.

11.title: Exotic Dancer
11.plot: Russ is elated when Nina suggests a threesome. Giovanna and Richard throw a wrench into Cody helping finance Lacey's line. Jason wants to preview his photos at Lacey's spring show. Lacey has a surprise for Jason and Vanessa.

12.title: Exposed
12.plot: Nicole makes a confession which may end things with Cody. Tracy causes trouble during a sexy photo shoot for Jason's new book. Lacey asks someone special to help with the show. Marilyn and Cormac work together to bring down Giovanna. Nicole wants out of her contract but may lose everything in the process. Giovanna and Richard have a private photo session.

13.title: Walk the Walk
13.plot: Tensions are high in the minutes before Lacey's new show. Jeffrey has to draft Russ's girlfriend Nina when a model sprains an ankle. Lacey fears that Jason is getting back together with Tracy. Marilyn's expose' hits the newsstands. Nicole seeks Cody's forgiveness. Jason has something important to say to Lacey.

imdb.plot outline: "Lingerie" is a sexy new cable series featuring an ensemble cast of beautiful people who design, photograph and model lingerie in New York City's fashion industry. Most of the stories revolve around Lacey Summers, who left a successful modeling career to design lingerie. Lacey lives in a large loft that doubles as her design studio. Her younger brother, Cody, lives a few blocks away with his wing man Russ. What Cody lacks in ambition he makes up for in charm and good looks. He's constantly popping in and out of Lacey's place helping himself to her food and occasionally to her models. Lacey's lingerie is in several NY boutiques yet Lacey struggles to make ends meet as costs for fabrics, photographers and models run higher than her income. To help keep costs down, Lacey decides to rent out her spare room to Vanessa, a beautiful young, want-to-be actress from Seattle. Lacey's best friend, Marilyn, writes for a gossip fashion magazine and does her best to promote Lacey's work, occasionally introducing her to investors and editors who can get her work seen. Unfortunately, one of the investors is more interested in ripping off Lacey's designs than he is in helping her. To complicate an already hectic life, Lacey's on-again-off-again photographer boyfriend, Jason, can't seem to keep his hands off Lacey's models. Jason and Lacey have an open relationship but when Jason sleeps with her new roommate, Vanessa, she realizes she's had enough. She breaks up with Jason and turns her romantic attentions to Rick, a NY City fireman. But Rick finds it hard to relate to Lacey's work. Though he admits he loves to see women in lingerie, he thinks lingerie is only good for as long as it takes a man to remove it from a woman. Rick would rather she go with him on weekend adventures, where they could off-road, climb mountains or camp; however, Lacey's a true city girl and doesn't enjoy the "great outdoors". Their relationship soon drifts apart. Lacey decides to take time off from her relationships and devote her energies to creating a new "Metro" line of lingerie which she promotes during a New York City Spring Fashion Show.
imdb.title: Lingerie
plot: "_Lingerie_ (qv)" is a sexy new cable series featuring an ensemble cast of beautiful people who design, photograph and model lingerie in New York City's fashion industry. Most of the stories revolve around Lacey Summers, who left a successful modeling career to design lingerie. Lacey lives in a large loft that doubles as her design studio. Her younger brother, Cody, lives a few blocks away with his wing man Russ. What Cody lacks in ambition he makes up for in charm and good looks. He's constantly popping in and out of Lacey's place helping himself to her food and occasionally to her models. Lacey's lingerie is in several NY boutiques yet Lacey struggles to make ends meet as costs for fabrics, photographers and models run higher than her income. To help keep costs down, Lacey decides to rent out her spare room to Vanessa, a beautiful young, want-to-be actress from Seattle. Lacey's best friend, Marilyn, writes for a gossip fashion magazine and does her best to promote Lacey's work, occasionally introducing her to investors and editors who can get her work seen. Unfortunately, one of the investors is more interested in ripping off Lacey's designs than he is in helping her. To complicate an already hectic life, Lacey's on-again-off-again photographer boyfriend, Jason, can't seem to keep his hands off Lacey's models. Jason and Lacey have an open relationship but when Jason sleeps with her new roommate, Vanessa, she realizes she's had enough. She breaks up with Jason and turns her romantic attentions to Rick, a NY City fireman. But Rick finds it hard to relate to Lacey's work. Though he admits he loves to see women in lingerie, he thinks lingerie is only good for as long as it takes a man to remove it from a woman. Rick would rather she go with him on weekend adventures, where they could off-road, climb mountains or camp; however, Lacey's a true city girl and doesn't enjoy the "great outdoors". Their relationship soon drifts apart. Lacey decides to take time off from her relationships and devote her energies to creating a new "Metro" line of lingerie which she promotes during a New York City Spring Fashion Show.::John Quinn
